name: Fushigi no Kuni no Angelique
overview: Fushigi no Kuni no Angelique, roughly translated as "Angelique's Wonderland", is a part of the Neoromance franchise. The story is based on the Alice's Adventures in Wonderland. After falling through the hole, Angelique's goal is to reach the four o'clock tea party in time. Similar to Mario Party games, the gameplay happens on a board. The game also features minigames and a dating simulator.
